#labels Featured
== Rhythmbox 3 ==

The users that have Rhythmbox 0.13 or later must install the SVN version or the 0.5_beta deb package:

 # $ svn checkout http://tab-rhythmbox-plugin.googlecode.com/svn/trunk tab-rhythmbox-plugin-read-only
 # $ cd tab-rhythmbox-plugin-read-only
 # $ sudo cp -r tabsearch /usr/lib/rhythmbox/plugins/
 # $ sudo cp tabsearch/tab-prefs.ui /usr/share/rhythmbox/plugins/tabsearch
 # $ sudo cp tab-rhythmbox.svg /usr/share/rhythmbox/plugins/tabsearch
 # $ sudo cp org.gnome.rhythmbox.plugins.tabsearch.gschema.xml /usr/share/glib-2.0/schemas/
 # $ glib-compile-schemas /usr/share/glib-2.0/schemas/
 # Launch Rhythmbox and activate the plugin
 

== Rhythmbox < 0.13 ==

For Rhythmbox 0.12 (no gtk3) must install the 0.4.1 version with the following commands or installing the deb package:
 # $ sudo apt-get install python-lxml
 # $ tar -xvzf tabsearch-0.4.1.tar.gz
 # $ cp -r tabsearch/ $HOME/.gnome2/rhythmbox/plugins/
 # Launch Rhythmbox and activate the plugin

== Installation from deb package ==
 # Download the package from the downloads section
 # $ sudo apt-get install python-lxml
 # $ sudo dpkg -i <path + deb package filename>
